name: HD Zombie Skateboarder High School - Surviving The Fire - Single And Multiplayer!
name_original: HD Zombie Skateboarder High School - Surviving The Fire - Single And Multiplayer!
description:
Now that the world has been taken over by us zombies - we need to get to school! And what could be more fun than skating past the burning city, collecting more brains to help with the school work!?

But you've got to get to school fast! Outrun the flames - you can see how close they are at the bottom of the screen! :-)

Play against other REAL zombies (well, okay, just people) as they try to out-skate you! You'll see them as big zombies that flicker away from you at the start... catch them!!

Unlock new zombie characters! Complete levels collecting as many brains (mmmm... brains....) as you can!

But don't let the flames from the burning buildings catch up with you or it's all over... just skate, skate, skate!!

This version is especially made for HD iPad displays!

Zombie Skater is completely free to play but some in-game items such as new characters will require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device's settings.
